title: Facebook Conversion Event Mixin
description: Group of fields used in collecting client-side conversion events for the Facebook platform.

facebook:fbp.title: Facebook Conversion Browser Id
facebook:fbp.description: When the Facebook pixel is installed on a website, and the pixel uses first-party cookies, the pixel automatically saves a unique identifier to an _fbp cookie for the website domain if one does not already exist. The fbp event parameter value must be of the form version.subdomainIndex.creationTime.randomnumber.

facebook:fbc.title: Facebook Conversion Click Id
facebook:fbc.description: When a user clicks on an ad on Facebook, the link sometimes includes a fbclid query parameter. When the user lands on the target website, if the website has a Facebook pixel that uses first-party cookies, the pixel automatically saves the fbclid query parameter to an _fbc cookie for that website domain. The fbc event parameter value must be of the form version.subdomainIndex.creationTime.fbclid

facebook:predicted_ltv.title: Predicted Lifetime Value
facebook:predicted_ltv.description: The predicted lifetime value of a conversion event. Example: 432.12.
